statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Write a program to determine the summation of several sets of integers.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: The input file will consist of up to 250 sets of integers, where each set contains at most 100 integers and the integer values will be between –16000 and + 16000. Each set of numbers is started with the number of integers in the set, n. The next n input lines will each contain one integer of the set. You should stop processing when the size of the set, n, is<= 0.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: A single line of output should be generated for each set of integers. The line should have format shown below.

statement.title: Sample Output
statement.content:
Sum of #1 is 4
Sum of #2 is 36
Sum of #3 is -15979

statement.title: Source
statement.content: 2008 “Sunline Cup” National Invitational Contest - Warm Up
